long_description: Designed to fit comfortably during dynamic activity such as hiking or climbing, the Icebreaker Relay boxer briefs use ultralight merino wool to regulate comfort in any weather. Made of soft, nonirritating merino wool with a touch of spandex for stretch, the Icebreaker Relay boxer briefs offer very light warmth and resist odors naturally. Ultralight merino wool wicks away moisture, dries quickly and breathes well. Fabric offers protection from UV light with a rating of UPF 50+. Flatlock seams reduce chafing, and gusseted inseam increases freedom of motion. Machine washable; line dry or dry flat in shade. The Icebreaker Relay boxer briefs have a functional fly and a slim fit.
short_description: Designed to fit comfortably during dynamic activity such as hiking or climbing, the Icebreaker Relay boxer briefs use ultralight merino wool to regulate comfort in any weather.
